title: Team builder icons
body: So I just went through 5 games of team builder as assassin. I didn't get the icon. I'm not sure if this is gonna take a while to get delivered to me or it's too late, but I really want the icon :C.  Someone please help me if possible <3

replies.body:
Hey Grauis, 

I'd suggest submitting a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look and see why the icon wasn't granted to your account. :]
They did have a notice up awhile ago that there's an issue with unlocking the icons right now.
